```{r}
#### Workspace setup ####
#install.packages()
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

``` {r}
#### Download data ####
raw_pockets_data <-
  read_csv(
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/the-pudding/data/725dc18a59a055891dee25e85652f416b0065bdd/pockets/measurements.csv",
    show_col_types = FALSE,
    skip = 0
  )

```


```{r}
#### Save data ####
write_csv(
  x = raw_pockets_data,
  file = here::here("data/raw_data/raw_pockets_data.csv")
)
```
